name: athena-campaign-cloudflare-deploy
description: Cloudflare Pages deployment for Athena Campaign Website

scripts.dev: cd ../web && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build: cd ../web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.preview: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages dev ../web/.vercel/output/static --port=3000
scripts.deploy: cd ../web && npm install && npm run build && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages && cd ../cloudflare-deploy && wrangler pages deploy ../web/.vercel/output/static
scripts.deploy:production: cd ../web && npm install && npm run build && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages && cd ../cloudflare-deploy && wrangler pages deploy ../web/.vercel/output/static --env production
scripts.deploy:preview: cd ../web && npm install && npm run build && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages && cd ../cloudflare-deploy && wrangler pages deploy ../web/.vercel/output/static --env preview
